mng: public, collectively owned, common, international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar), make public, fair, just, Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4], honorable (gentlemen), father-in-law, male (animal)

exm.mng: (Ministry of) Public Security, public safety, public security
to announce, to make public, to publish
to handle official business, to work (esp. in an office)
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
